content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (10.5, 34.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (10.5, 34.5)
- Boiler at position (0.5, 28.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-3.5, 27.5)
- PipeGroup for water at position (-3.5, 26.5)
- PipeGroup for steam at position (1.5, 26.5)

### Power Network
- Expanded power network from the lab at position (5.5, 5.5) to the power source at position (10.5, 34.5)
- Includes multiple poles at positions such as (7.5, 13.5), (9.5, 23.5), (13.5, 27.5), (16.5, 31.5), and (12.5, 34.5)

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -82.5) and another at (41.5, -83.5)
- BeltGroup with belts at positions (50.5, -86.5) to (48.5, -86.5) and (49.5, -86.5) to (47.5, -86.5)

### Iron Plate Storage
- Iron Chest at position (56.5, -83.5) with iron plates

### Miscellaneous
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) and another at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### No Pipe Group Found
- Ensure all necessary pipe connections are established and correctly aligned to form a complete group.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
